I ordered what I thought would be corduroy joggers with a cinched ankle. These pants are not corduroy. They are made from a thin, flimsy material and they are not joggers. They are straight legged pants. Awful. Returning immediately.
I will order a darker brown.
I got these for my boyfriend for Christmas. They look expensive. Runs a little big.
Warm and comfortable. Really nice winter pants. Thank you.

The color is very nice and these pants are very comfortable.  Good for wearing around the house or out shopping.  I am between L or XL, and I suggest going to the smaller size if you are unsure.  I have washed and dried these once with no shrinkage.  The L size gives me plenty of room (I am 6-ft, 195 lbs, average build).  Coofandy usually has good products at a good value and these are no exception.

I got a size large in the brown. Extremely comfortable maybe a little on the larger side. I’m 5’9”s tall so they hit me about an inch above the ankle which is fine. I like them that way. They have stretch to them. They are just the right thickness, not too thick, not too thin. I love them and get compliments every time I wear them. Deep pockets, which I love. Just wonderful.
These corduroy pants are so very stylish! They look extremely nice on my son and, the best part, he wears them frequently!
I love these cords so comfortable and they look good. One drawback my sister told me she owned a pair too and don’t want to be twinsy
These pants wash and dry really nice.  My Dad loves the elastic waistband and elastic at the ankles.  I got him 3 different colors.

I haven't worn corduroy for over 30 years now and don't see others wearing them too often these days. My wife suggested I try this and I was surprised at how comfortable they felt. They are a little loose around the thigh and waist but it works fine for me. I use it for casual outdoor walks, especially during the cooler months. The tapered fit and fabric give it a stylish look, albeit vintage. I think these are worth a try as a more fashionable set of jogging pants.
Even though I don't care for polyester, they did an amazing job on the fabric.  The style, fit and comfort are excellent.  I bought three pair and love them.
A little short in the kegs for me. Also has old man styling about them.

These fit me great and are really stylish. The corduroy material is really soft. Super happy!
Definitely warm and comfortable. They look pretty cool in the material is really nice.. True decides on the fit. A little pricey for the product but all in all still really good.
These pants fit true to size. They are not fitted. They are very comfortable to wear. They look great on. I love the color. Material is soft.
Very comfortable and light weight.
Coofandy is a quality product for both men and women. Super soft, washes well. I'm a forever fan!

I love corduroy! And these are definitely like the old school cords we used to wear 35 yrs ago! Soft! Thick! Well made great pockets perfectly placed! These look good on! No wrinkles and they fit to size! I have recommended!
I’m very impressed with these pants , They are well made and Very comfortable. With cooler weather ahead these will be perfect to wear on the cooler days. And they are a Good Value for the money . 👍

Bases on Amazon's recommendation, I got an XL, which is pretty typical for pants for me. They were way too baggy and big. They felt like they were larger than an XL. The style looked ok, but they just seemed off to me. Nothing I can really explain, but they just didn't look the same as they do in the images. If these offer a 'try before you buy' option, you'd be best to do that so that you can see these up close first.

Was looking for corduroy pants instead of jeans as they are warmer during the late fall months, but need something I could work around the house in instead of dress pants. The only thing I am not thrilled about is the cuff at the bottom. But I can work around it.
Super comfy lounge pants. Great fit and cozy material. Teens boy approved!
Excellent product that requires minimum maintenance. Nice fit that one can dress up or just relax in.
Perfect fit. Very comfortable and soft to the touch. I would recommend to anyone

These pants are comfortable and fit as expected.  I ordered an XL and I am 6' 175lbs and they are a bit big and a bit long.  If I ordered again, I would get a Large.  These pants are a thick material and they shouldn't tear easily.  The bottom of the pants has a stretchy hem.  They bunch up over your shoes, if you are into that kind of parachute pants style.  They look more corduroy in person than in the pictures.These pants are comfortable to wear and put on and lounge around the house, or to go out.
Soft, lightweight material. True to size/color. Easy to wash.

Walk, run, play and feel great as you do.  These thin layered corduroy sweat pants are comfortable and pliable.  Wear them to an informal dinner date, or just a cordial gathering.  They look and feel great.

These Drawstring Pants are super comfortable and beautiful to wear in outdoor activities, the fabric is very strong but quite soft, it fit perfectly to my husband's size which is M, they can be washed in the washing machine and dryer and they have not lost color, something also important is that they are not hot so you can wear them without problem in any activity you want this summer.

These gray jogger pants are so soft,  Will be comfy to wear in the cooler months. Made with quality & care. My grandson usually gets an XL in casual pants but I think he will drown in these since the style is already baggy.  I see where the model is about 2" taller and about 13 lbs heavier than my grandson  and is wearing just a medium.  So check your size. These will be lounge at home pants this fall & winter.

Men’s joggers are comfortable! Runs a bit bigger than expected, definitely has a baggy look and feel, I ordered a size small. For reference I’m a female, 5’7 approximately 140lbs, I have a big booty and thick hips and thighs. I wish these were slightly smaller, but these will be great for lounging around the house. Material is medium thickness and weight, pockets are deep and can easily hold a large phone. These will be especially nice in the fall! Definitely recommend!

Got these pants for my teenage son. They are a heavier material without much give, but they are made a bit on the larger side, so they are still comfortable to wear and have room to move. I wouldn't suggest choosing these to wear to the gym, but for comfort wear, they look nice and he's happy with them.

评论概述: The material is a little off
评论详情: The pants aren't terrible but something just feels off about them. The fit, length wise and waist wise, isn't bad but they feel weirdly baggy in the thighs and the texture isn't super great. In theory, they aren't bad and I can see myself wearing them from time to time but not as frequently as other joggers I own.  As for being "joggers" they I don't think these would be the best choice for jogging. But for just street wear they aren't bad

评论概述: comfy, casual, fits mostly true to size
评论详情: These pants are casual corduroy joggers that fit mostly true to size. The pants will run a bit longer than expected at first glance, but considering how the pantleg drapes, this seems more like an aesthetic choice (for a baggier fit) than a true sizing issue. If you're concerned, I might go a size down to be sure though.  In terms of look, they wear well, and I haven't had any issues or concerns after a few wearings out.

These just don't do it for me. The quality is still fine but the actual design of these just miss the mark. I feel like these may get better with excessive use and wear but... fresh out of the package... these are sadly a miss.

评论概述: Good cut, fit exactly as expected
评论详情: Good cut and feel, large is sized as expected. Roomy but not too baggy and tapered is as expected for a jogger style pants. Drawstring is a proper length, long but not ridiculously generous in length. Feels nice and warm as corduroy should, thick of course. Pockets are roomy and all the stitching looks solid.

The corduroy fabric gives these joggers a unique, stylish look that sets them apart from regular sweatpants. The baggy fit is trendy and provides a relaxed feel without looking sloppy. The drawstring elastic waist ensures a snug yet comfortable fit, making them perfect for casual wear or lounging around the house.  These joggers are incredibly comfortable. The soft corduroy material feels great against the skin and offers just the right amount of warmth. They are perfect for cooler days but breathable enough to wear indoors without overheating. The elastic waistband and cuffs add to the overall comfort, allowing for easy movement.  The quality of these joggers is impressive. The stitching is solid, and the material feels durable and well-made. I’ve washed them several times, and they have held up well without any signs of wear or fading. The corduroy fabric maintains its texture and color beautifully.

Love corduroys it’s comfortable, smooth to touch and soft on skin even on hotter days. Get you normal size for regular fit, up size for looser fit. Im 5’7” and medium is great length and baggy fit. I could use deeper pockets but these will do

Attached photo to show texture of material …Corduroy joggers in black, with elastic tapered ankle; the ankle fit is still loose on the leg (not fitted tightly to leg). The sizing seems similar to other jogger styles, but this material is not stretchy, and might be something to use for “around town” casual wear (not for athletic wear). The pockets are also more shallow (more for day wear and not working out). (Value of $23.98 at time of review)

评论概述: Pockets are shallow, and the corduroy doesn't give.
评论详情: I'm not very impressed with these joggers.  The pockets are too shallow to hold anything well, and they have no type of closure to keep things in -- especially if you try jogging in them.  The material itself doesn't have any "give" and I don't think these would work well for jogging.  I usually love everything from this brand, but this particular article of clothing is not for me.  It's a bit disappointing.
Es cierto parece más una pijama que algo que quieras usar para vestir, no termina de tener un estilo definido.

I can't say that i'm surprised, but these are definitely more like pajamas and are not something you'd likely want to wear in public.  Very loose and thin, the cuffs are also overly wide, so the result is it's not quite  jogger style, but also not a standard pant. It's just it's own special blend of awkward.  Fairly comfortable though.
